subject: Basketball
Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
T-Shirts (Apparel)
lead_paragraph: An elaborate plan led to LeBron James wearing an “I Can’t Breathe” T-shirt when the Cavaliers faced the Nets in Brooklyn on Monday night.
snippet: An elaborate plan led to LeBron James wearing an “I Can’t Breathe” T-shirt when the Cavaliers faced the Nets in Brooklyn on Monday night.
